plays.text: Penalty to Andrew Hutchinson 2 minutes for Holding Martin Gelinas
Goal scored by Ville Peltonen (Power Play) assisted by Nathan Horton and Olli Jokinen

Penalty to Jay Bouwmeester 2 minutes for Cross checking Eric Staal
Penalty to Erik Cole 2 minutes for Slashing Martin Gelinas
Penalty to Kamil Kreps 2 minutes for Holding Chad LaRose
Penalty to Josef Vasicek 2 minutes for Hooking Juraj Kolnik
Penalty to Juraj Kolnik 2 minutes for Holding the Stick Josef Vasicek
Goal scored by David Tanabe unassisted
Goal scored by Jay Bouwmeester assisted by Olli Jokinen and Ville Peltonen
Goal scored by Martin Gelinas assisted by Chris Gratton and Bryan Allen
Penalty to Mike Van Ryn 2 minutes for Holding Scott Walker
Penalty to Mike Van Ryn 2 minutes for Hooking Justin Williams
Goal scored by David Tanabe (Power Play) assisted by Andrew Hutchinson and Rod Brind'Amour
Goal scored by Erik Cole assisted by Andrew Ladd and Eric Staal
Penalty to Noah Welch 2 minutes for Delaying Game – Puck over Glass(opposing player not identified)
Goal scored by Eric Staal (Power Play) assisted by Ray Whitney and Justin Williams
Penalty to Bryan Allen 2 minutes for Kneeing Erik Cole
Goal scored by Rod Brind'Amour unassisted
